title: TEMPLATE Miniature chair inspired by Ikea Ingolf in 1:12 scale | PDF
description: To make this miniature chair, you will need: wooden sticks 1.7 cm and 6 mm wide and 1.5 mm thick (or a thin wooden sheet of similar thickness), Tacky Glue, sandpaper, and optional paint for finishing. The price includes 1 PDF file (A4) containing a detailed assembly diagram and cutting templates for each part. All parts are labeled according to the scheme to make assembly easy and intuitive. Please note that the template is made at a 1:12 scale and cannot be enlarged withoutâ€¦
